mapper.select: SELECT a.kepco_cstmr_no custNo, a.ami_idx amiIdx, a.data_request_dt dataRequestDt, IF(a.request_success_dt IS NULL, DATE_FORMAT(b.reg_dt,'%Y%m%d'), DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(a.request_success_dt, INTERVAL 1 DAY),'%Y%m%d')) requestSuccessDt FROM tb_kepco_api_result a, tb_cnsmr b WHERE a.kepco_cstmr_no = b.kepco_cstmr_no AND a.del_yn = 'N' AND ( a.request_success_dt != DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -2 DAY),'%Y%m%d') OR a.request_success_dt IS NULL )
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO tb_kepco_hour( metering_date, hh, ami_idx, use_type, reg_dt, mid, kepco_cstmr_no, metering_val, accmlt_metering_val ) SELECT * FROM (
( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT( #{item.meteringDate}, #{item.meteringTime},'00'),'%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), INTERVAL -15 MINUTE ),'%Y%m%d'), DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT( #{item.meteringDate}, #{item.meteringTime},'00'),'%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), INTERVAL -15 MINUTE),'%H'), #{item.amiIdx}, '1', sysdate(), #{item.meterNo}, #{item.custNo}, #{item.meteringVal} AS meteringVal,
#{item.accmltMeteringVal} AS accmltMeteringVal
IFNULL((SELECT accmlt_metering_val FROM (SELECT MAX(accmlt_metering_val) AS accmlt_metering_val FROM tb_kepco_15m WHERE ami_idx = #{item.amiIdx} AND use_type = '1') AS a), #{item.meteringVal} ) AS accmltMeteringVal
)
) AS A
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE metering_val = metering_val + meteringVal, accmlt_metering_val = accmltMeteringVal

INSERT INTO tb_kepco_day( metering_date, ami_idx, use_type, reg_dt, mid, kepco_cstmr_no, metering_val, accmlt_metering_val ) SELECT * FROM (

#{item.accmltMeteringVal} AS accmltMeteringVal
IFNULL((SELECT accmlt_metering_val FROM (SELECT MAX(accmlt_metering_val) AS accmlt_metering_val FROM tb_kepco_hour WHERE ami_idx = #{item.amiIdx} AND use_type = '1') AS a), #{item.meteringVal} ) AS accmltMeteringVal
)
) AS A
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE metering_val = metering_val + meteringVal, accmlt_metering_val = accmltMeteringVal
